item.title: A summary of reporting tools from R
item.description: Introduction The data science pipeline often leads to some sort of report, typically a research paper in academia, or a data product in industry. Since this class caters more to the academia/research side, letâ€™s describe some of the ways we can report the results of our data analyses. Literate programming The CRAN Task Views page on Reproducible Research describes reproducible research as follows: The goal of reproducible research is to tie specific instructions to data analysis and experimental data so that scholarship can be recreated, better understood and verified.
